Html:
Is there a way to filter out BOP crafted items by profession? As it appears now...we have the option to remove an entire profession from the filtered list but not filtering by BOP or BOE crafted items. If it is possible, I would like to have the ability to filter out BOP crafted items for professions that my current character model does not have.

Thanks...

K

So as an example...if I de-select engineering from the filters...it will just remove any BOP engineering items & still show BOE ones? I was under the impression that all engineering crafted items would be removed from the list regardless of whether it was BOE or BOP.
